name: Magnificent Victorian Townhouse with Parking.
title: Jim Thorpe, Pennsylvania

gallery.caption: Fully stocked kitchen with welcome basket & coffee station.
Exquisite dinning room to share a meal right off the kitchen.
First floor sitting parlor with remote control fireplace & piano.
First floor hall from sitting room, kitchen to second floor.
Parking for 2 cars in Trappe Ally located behind the house.

hosts.about:
I fell in love with Jim Thorpe since visiting over twenty years ago. You'll feel that when you stay in the home we've meticulously restored to its original era and are  so excited to share with you. 

By day I'm a teacher in the Bronx. By night, I lovingly tend to three teenagers & 
a whippet named Dobby in West Orange New Jersey.

Michelle (photo) will be your local hostess. Feel free to book or message with any questions. She'll ensure your stay is both comfortable and memorable and can be onsite if needed. 

Be sure to ask her for any local info or dining recommendations.  She's always in the know.

recent.comments: We really enjoyed our stay here. The house has so much character and was extremely clean. Location is perfect!

items.comments: We really enjoyed our stay here. The house has so much character and was extremely clean. Location is perfect!

The Dimmick House is as advertised!
We have nothing negative to say.
Charles was very helpful and quite responsive.

The home was truly exactly like the photos and one of the most unique Airbnb's I've stayed at. 

It's incredibly well equipped with linens, towels, bath products, cooking equipment, and basic spices. The location is smack in the middle of Jim Thorpe and a pretty good spot if you're trying to explore the Poconos area. The host was very proactive about their communication and instructions were very clear throughout. We had no issues with the AC at any point (which was a life saver in mid-July) and the 3rd floor offered a great space for us to chill. 

I would definitely stay here again if I needed to come back to the area!

This is a great property in the walkable old Jim Thorpe area. It's easily accessible to all the restaurants, shops, train, museum, etc. At the same time, it has all the amenities you may need: parking, full kitchen, many beds, and even a piano. The house is thoughtfully decorated, unique, and comfortable. There are many different spaces to relax and socialize. I highly recommend this if you're looking to explore Jim Thorpe with a large family or group of friends.

We absolutely loved our stay in this beautiful home! Each space was wonderfully decorated and gorgeous. They thought of everything! The beds were extremely comfortable. The location is perfect. The property manager, Michelle, is so helpful and friendly. We felt honored to stay here and look forward to coming back soon!!
Such a wonderful unique place to stay. My third time at this home and just as good as the first time. Also love the town.

Fantastic stay! Best AirBnb we’ve ever stayed in. The location of the home is the best in Jim Thorpe. The house is immaculate and jaw-dropping gorgeous with antiques and decor. If you get the opportunity to stay here, DO IT! You will not regret it!

description.summary:
Step back in time in an immersive Victorian experience. This historic home, built by Congressman Milo Dimmick in 1871, has been authentically & lovingly restored & is equipped with all modern amenities.  
The house comfortably fits up to 8 adults & is not recommended for small children. 
2 private, parking spaces are located at the rear of the house.  Situated in the heart of the historic district we are steps away from The Mauch Chunk Opera house, all shops & restaurants.
description.space:
Magnificent, Italianate Victorian home, meticulously restored to the original period detail. The opulence will transport you to a bygone era. 
Fully equipped kitchen with spices & oils for cooking.
On site washer/dryer
Gas fireplace
Grand piano & spacious sitting parlor. 
50 inch smart TV w. Hulu/Netflix/Prime video & Direct TV in 3rd floor media room.
2 compact car parking spaces on site.
+No Pets+
+Not Child friendly+
description.access: The entire home, 3 floors with 2x living room areas, 5x bedrooms. 1.5 bathrooms, a second floor balcony & laundry room in basement.
description.notes:
When messaging about kids, please know the house is filled with sharp edges, antiques and frequently polished wooden floors. It's not that we don't love little ones, we're just looking out for their safety.
Pets are not permitted.
description.neighborhood: See why Jim Thorpe has been dubbed The Switzerland of America and is continuously voted top ten of “small towns” to visit in the U.S.A. It's natural, unrivaled beauty is the backdrop to shops, restaurants, hiking, biking, rafting, skiing, concerts and more.
description.transit: Everything the town offers is within walking distance.
description.interaction:
Self Check in, keyless entry.
Property manager can be onsite within minutes if needed.
description.house_rules:
No shoes in the house please. A shoe rack is available at the rear entry of the house.
OVERSTAY fee: $25 per 1/2 hour per guest after 10am checkout.
This is a non smoking property.

name: Glasshouse overlooking the Great Marsh
title: Elverson, Pennsylvania

gallery.caption: Welcome to the "Glasshouse" that was built in 1953 by Montgomery and Bishop, Students of Frank Lloyd Wright.
A view of the Glasshouse from the farm fields.
Living Room with gas fireplace and baby grand piano.
We call this the "Birdwatchers Corner" of the living room.
Laundry room. Located in the basement.
Our 6 ducks enjoying the pond in the courtyard at the Glasshouse.
Enjoy using our canoes and or Kayaks to explore the Great Marsh.
Our local heard, Oliver, the horse and his two goat companions, Felix and Fennel.
Our private road. A great place to take a walk and enjoy the ourdoors.
Our dock that leads to a viewing area of the upper marsh.

recent.comments: The Glasshouse at the Great Marsh really was spectacular. The home is beautiful and full of light during the day. The property is peaceful with plenty of space to explore while being only minutes away from good restaurants and plenty of services. Really a hidden gem.

items.comments: The Glasshouse at the Great Marsh really was spectacular. The home is beautiful and full of light during the day. The property is peaceful with plenty of space to explore while being only minutes away from good restaurants and plenty of services. Really a hidden gem.
It was perfect for my bridal shower absolutely breathtaking! It was a magical ❤️
The place exceeded expectations - unique and beautiful.
Love everything!!!!!!!!
The house and the property were beautiful and Lorrie was a friendly, helpful, and responsive host. Can't wait to come back!

Lori's house was in a stunning location - private and with fantastic views. Our kids enjoyed walking on the property and looking at the ducks and other animals. Lori was friendly and quick to respond to our questions. A truly wonderful stay!

This location is a stand out. Lori was a fantastic host and communicated proactively; an absolute pleasure. 
The Glass House is a fantastic space; surrounded by nature-yet close enough to plenty of activities. We would absolutely recommend-and plan on returning.

description.summary: Come enjoy the Great Marsh of Chester County, PA. We have 600 acres for you to enjoy hiking, bird watching, biking our trails, kayaking/canoeing our marsh or just finding a quite place on the property to enjoy the outdoors. We also have a non-profit on the property called "Great Marsh Institute".
description.space: The Glasshouse was originally built in 1953 by Montgomery and Bishop. They were students of Frank Lloyd Wright, the famous architect, designer, writer and educator. The Glasshouse recently underwent a three and a half year renovation and is now ready to welcome you.
description.access: The entirety of the upper floor of the Glasshouse is reserved for you. This includes a fully furnished master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, an additional hall bathroom, two furnished bedrooms and an office space. Additionally, there is a fully equipped kitchen, dinning room, and living room with floor to celling glass windows and a cozy gas fireplace. You will also have access to the laundry room downstairs, complete with washer and dryer. We request that you remain on the upper floor as the basement is occasionally used by the family to access storage. However, we want you to feel at home in the Glasshouse, so if need be, we can inform you when we need to enter the basement through a separate entrance. This is a working farm so from time to time we may be driving by the Glasshouse on our UTV’s or tractor to access parts of the property.
description.interaction: There are 3 other houses on the property so if anything is needed during your stay there is always someone around to help.

Yes it was beautiful and peaceful and my family loved as well as my beautiful grandkids loved it too. Would do it again love they had complementary drinks and snacks . Love the host will do again

Hieu’s home is pretty much the exact same in person as it is in the photos! There is plenty of room overalls, but the kitchen, bedrooms, and bathrooms are all extremely spacious! There is also enough parking to fit several cars. Hieu was responsive and easy to communicate with.
Stayed with 8 adult and 8 kids. It was lovely spacious and beautiful. Will recommend to anyone.
This was such a beautiful house in a wonderful location.
This was a wonderful stay. Hieu was friendly, responsive and super accommodating. Would definitely stay again!

The place was exactly as the pictures.  Bright open kitchen and dining area.  The place was clean enough for my high standards.  There were plenty of sleeping areas and beds for the 15 of us that stayed.  We had 9 kids and 6 adults.  There were plenty of cooking supplies that we were able to cook most of our meals.  The owner was very responsive to any questions and even left us a bottle of wine as a welcome.  Would definitely stay again.

description.summary:
A new 2,700 sf 4-bedroom home, new appliances, a private pool , a gazebo with table and chairs. The elegant kitchen offers a large island with bar seating, and a dining table. There are two primary suites - one downstairs, one upstairs, and each with its own bathroom. The upstairs suit has a fireplace, TV, big walk in closet, huge bathroom, and a balcony that you can see the ocean water.  The two guest rooms share a bathroom upstairs. One full bath on the main floor
Plenty of parking spaces
description.space:
Paradise Beach Retreat
Whether you're planning to explore Pasadena, Annapolis, Baltimore, or Washington, DC, this four-bedroom home in Pasadena perfectly for your vacation and retreat. Enjoy a new house, new appliances, and magnificent outdoor spaces that include a private pool and an expansive backyard.
This home has more than 2,700 square feet. The elegant kitchen anchors the main level, offering new stainless steel appliances, a large island with bar seating, and a country dining table.

There are two primary suites - one downstairs, one upstairs, and each with its own bathroom. The huge upstairs suit has a fireplace, TV, big walk in closet, huge bathroom, and a balcony that you can see the ocean water.  The two guest rooms share a bathroom upstairs. There is one extra full bath for you to take a shower after soaking in the pool on the main floor.
The pool area has a gazebo with table and chairs for you to relax in the sun after swimming in the pool.
 There are plenty of parking spaces in the front of the house.
description.access: The entire main building is open to guests.
description.notes: There is one camera in the back overlooking the pool and one camera in the front. They only record when there is movement.
description.neighborhood: The atmosphere is generally quiet, with the neighbors going all out on decorations during events and holidays.

description.interaction: I am available via Airbnb messaging.

**** If you are local, you need to state the reason for booking with AirBnB before approval ****

Maximum of 8 vehicles

- NOTE: Your safety matters. This property features 2 exterior security cameras: 1 camera is located on the front of the home facing the yard, driveway, and front entrance, and 1 camera is on the back of the home facing the backyard. The cameras are outward facing and do not look into interior spaces. The cameras actively record video and sound when motion is detected by the devices

hosts.about: We are very  friendly and do enjoy hosting people.   We love music and the arts and are both musician.

recent.comments: Can’t say enough about what a great host he was.  He stayed in touch to make our stay as pleasant as possible and always offered to provide help if needed … beautiful home, easy check in/out.. great amenities… clean home.  We had everything we needed and being close to grocery was amazing.  He also offered a later check out if we needed it.  We felt so at home.  Thanks for the wonderful time in your beautiful home.   It was perfect for our family.  Thanks for being a super host.

items.comments: Can’t say enough about what a great host he was.  He stayed in touch to make our stay as pleasant as possible and always offered to provide help if needed … beautiful home, easy check in/out.. great amenities… clean home.  We had everything we needed and being close to grocery was amazing.  He also offered a later check out if we needed it.  We felt so at home.  Thanks for the wonderful time in your beautiful home.   It was perfect for our family.  Thanks for being a super host.

We had a great time with our family last weekend. Nemeh’s house was beautiful, clean and very spacious with ample amenities for large groups. Happy to recommend this place for family reunions and celebrations. Thank you!

Nemeh home was absolutely BEAUTIFUL! He was extremely responsive and nice. I have no complains about the home. My guest loved the location and we felt at home.  Thank you for the outstanding hospitality, Nemeh.

Very clean and well kept house and yard. A few things could have been better. Some sheets were on wrong size beds, and couple dirty pillow cases. Also some towels smelt like bleach from the jacuzzi. Likely because it's left on the guests to put the towels in laundry before they leave. Unlikely most guests have time to do laundry the morning they need to pack and check out, catch flights etc.  Also with nearly $1000 cleaning fee this shouldn't be asked of the guests to do. So all issues with the house seem to come down to the responsibility of laundering being put on the guests to do. other than this the house was clean, great amenities, plenty of space inside and out. Very pleasant and enjoyable.  Note if you have someone who can't do stairs, the only sleeping option for them is a pull out couch in the living room. All other beds are downstairs or upstairs. We didn't quite understand that, so my Mom had to sleep on the pull out couch, which wasn't really restful  unfortunately.

I spent lot of time and had booked for 2 nights and got confirmation as well but next day received note from host that reservation allowed for min 3 nights and started negotiating more money for 3 nights(Planned ONLY 2 nights). I was in chat / call half of the day to short out the issue.
If this the case 'System suppose to stop us booking'.

We were VERY disappointed with grill and hot tub (VERY DIRTY). With empty GAS cylinder, not able to grill and complete meat trashed.

I'd expect to receive short note with passcode / Wi-Fi info etc.,  i don't have to go back and read the entire description to get small info. 

Overall house is very comfortable and amenities are very good.

The house was beautiful and spacious. Beds were compfy. We were disappointed that the ice maker or water on fridge door didn’t work. There were also no batteries in any remotes so we couldn’t watch tv. The dishwasher had to be filled with clean dishes or it wouldn’t work. Again, the place was beautiful but the little inconveniences and house rules made a big difference in our rating.

It was more than I expected, even after seeing the pictures. It was kid friendly, and plenty of space for them. I think I was just so nervous about them, the toddlers, running around, I felt like the “House Police”.  The one thing I did do was to invest in covers/throws for those white couches. 

Nemeh’s was always one step ahead of me. He was very responsive to ANY of my questions.

It’s a very modern home with lots of smart services. You definitely felt safe here. We also enjoyed the patio and cooking out with family and friends.  Love the extra long dining room table. It was definitely a gathering space.  As the kids continue to grow up and have more grands , I would lived to rent again! Plenty of bedrooms and bathrooms, which was a must for us. 

Thanks again


9.5/10

description.summary: This  Victorian Villa  will take your breath away! The property is huge and is  over 7200  sq ft.  with 8 bedrooms and  6 bathroom.  Also a  stunning Gourmet Kitchen & large designer bathrooms.  Great for large groups and business retreats!
description.space: A truly stunning  new  Victorian Vila.  Pictures don't do it Justice.   Its very luxurious and is very spacious.   The beds are great to sleep on and are very comfortable.   You will feel like you are in a palace.   There are 7 bedrooms and also a bedroom loft with a Full size bunk bed.  The property is  only 15 min away to Washington D.C.  And is in a great central location.  The house  so big that it is great for family reunions and gatherings.
description.access: House is entirely accessible except for one room which has utilities and storage space.   Also, the shed is not accessible.
description.notes:
There is a $35 charge per person per night above 15 people that will stay or  either visit/use the property with the guest.  Also, Pets are case by case basis and it’s $50 per night please check with us first. 

We will submit a  separate request to pay for the taxes and extra guests after the reservation is confirmed. That would be done a week before.checkin.  

we are requiring a minimum of 3 nights for reservations.  For Holidays such as thanksgiving  day, Christmas, Memorial Day 
Labor Day it is a 4 night minimum. 




There is an  outdoor security camera for checkin and security
description.neighborhood: Great area.. . Full of wonderful resteraunts and things to do.   Many parks around the area.  The property is 3 blocks away from the belt way so its super fast to get around in the metropolitan area
description.transit: There is a Bus stop 300 feet away..  Bus can take you to a metro station within 20 minutes.
description.interaction: You would have the entire property for yourself.  If you need us, we are very only 4 miles away and will be happy to help in any concert or questions.
description.house_rules:
Guests who booked the property are required to be there at time of check in. Keys will not be given if the guest who made reservation is not there 
Absolutely NO drugs or smoking.  If drugs or smoking is detected, you will be required to vacate the property and we will call the police.   
Absolutely No “ binge drinking Parties” allowed.   No Parties or events allowed. You have to check with us regarding an event that you do before you reserve, occasionally we make an exception.  
If  your leave the house, please turn all lights off.  
Shoes must be off  when in the house.   There are brand new hardwood floors and brand new white carpet.  We provide slippers
Before leaving all trash needs to be put in garbage cans outside.  
Also the guest who makes the reservation is required to be at check in.  House will not be released to other guests until the guest who has made the reservation is there.
Pets are allowed on a case by case.  Check with us first.   There would be an additional fee.
No eating or drinking beside the piano.  Do not lift the lid of the piano.  
Do not move any of the furniture.  If we find the furniture moved around,  you will be subjected to a penalty fee. 
Do not remove or take Air purifiers that are in each room of the house.  
Do NOT in any shape or form  park on the grass area. 
Eating ONLY  in the dinning area and the kitchen 
Please have the ladies use the makeup roomer provided NOT the towels     Quiet hours are from 10:00 pm to 7:00 am. 
The property is suitable for children and families

name: Luxury spa haven house close to DC monuments
title: Arlington, Virginia

gallery.caption: Master bathroom with a view and outdoor shower

hosts.about: Panama and USA . Doctor. 32 . Female. Single. Fun. Calm. Running. Yoga and beach

recent.comments: Second time to stay here and loved every minute. The house is exactly as described. The pool and the kitchen were highlights of the stay. Maria was a wonderful host and made sure the entire stay was seamless. Everything is clean and spotless. It is great for families. We will miss this home and hope to stay again in the future!

items.comments: Second time to stay here and loved every minute. The house is exactly as described. The pool and the kitchen were highlights of the stay. Maria was a wonderful host and made sure the entire stay was seamless. Everything is clean and spotless. It is great for families. We will miss this home and hope to stay again in the future!

This house is BEAUTIFUL! Maria is so easy to work with - she was responsive, answered questions very quickly, and was really flexible. The house is in a wonderful location and the backyard is an absolute oasis. Highly recommend!
Amazing home, even more beautiful than the pictures. Wish we could have stayed longer, and Maria was just wonderful.

This place is beautiful and spacious.  We quite enjoyed our gathering here.   We were a little disappointed that we couldn't access the hot tub because it had been winterized like the pool, but that was relatively minor.  A couple of our party were also disappointed that the TV in the family room was not working during our stay, but others were happy to not have a TV on while we were cooking/gathering/playing games there (and there were other TVs those family members could watch)!   The biggest hiccup for the teens/kids was that we couldn't access the internet for several hours after we arrived, but Maria was responsive and helpful in resolving the situation.  

Overall, we enjoyed spreading out in the home and were very comfortable.  During the days, we took the train to DC and did some tourist-y things, but spent our evenings together relaxing at this luxurious home and spending time together.  We'd stay again.

The amenities of an exclusive boutique hotel, combined with the privacy of a home is what you will find when renting this 
 artful vision of a house.

 Angels must have been singing when I walked into the master suite, because it's one of the most stunning invitations of comfort and style that I've ever seen in an Airbnb, and I truly felt as though I were sleeping in a cloud. Exploring the rest of the home is like a vacation within a vacation, as every corner of the home offers something to delight the soul.

Upland was an amazing experience for the entire family, and we are so grateful to Maria for offering her splendid home to us for the holidays. We will always remember this Christmas as one of our favorites.

I can’t say enough about Maria and her home! From the very start Maria was always so quick to answer any questions and was beyond gracious. She made the entire experience easy and seamless! As for the home, it’s beautiful. Beautifully decorated and extremely clean. My family of 10 adults and 3 little grandchildren spent a week here for Thanksgiving and it couldn’t have been better! The house is so spacious and inviting. The kitchen,dining area, and family room was the perfect area for all of us to hang out. The play room upstairs is a great bonus, as well as the gym in the lower level for any adults who want to work out. The pool table/ ping pong table was a hit as well as the movie room! The outside area is beautiful as well. My only regret was that it wasn’t summer so we couldn’t enjoy the pool and outdoor space! The location is perfect as well. On a nice quiet residential street but just minutes from grocery stores and restaurants. We could not have been happier! Thanks again Maria!

WOW!!!! This house is perfect for the family looking for luxury yet all of the modern conveniences for little ones. The house is in a great, quiet and safe neighborhood. We had plenty of room for our two kids and nanny. Maria was by far the best host we’ve had to date. Highly recommend for anyone used to high end properties.

description.summary: This unique place has a style all its own. This large family home is complete with pool and hot tub and its a haven for adults and children alike. It is bike able to all monuments. Parents can hit the gym or the steam room while kids relax in the movie room. There is also a pool table, outdoor fire pit and inviting bar area. There will not be a dull moment in this paradise home
description.neighborhood:
Quiet and family friendly and at the same time extremely close to DC and the monuments and museums. 
Lots of parks and trails close by
description.house_rules: No parties allowed

name: Old Bay Bungalow
title: Arnold, Maryland

gallery.caption: I believe nature IS nurture. Enjoy the flora and fauna from the relaxation of your private space.
Please, grab a book and read. Take it with you when you stroll to the beach.  Relax. I encourage it!
Please have a drink on me! Your fridge is stocked with yogurt, water, sodas, and local beers.
Coffee and a fireplace...like a hand in a glove!
May your nights be relaxed and your hearthstones warm....
There's many things I love around here. Family and snuggly chickens are at the top of the list!

The garden.  It expands every year!  GMO-free, grown from organic seed.  It gets a little wild towards the end of summer, but feel free to grab whatever's in season and enjoy it! Don't forget to stop and say hello to the chickens!
The kiddos playing at the private neighborhood beach.
Private, gated community beach, less than 3 blocks from your space, a perfect place to reflect and relax. Grab the beach key and enjoy your day on the Magothy River.
Samson enjoying one of many beautiful sunsets on the Severn River.
Sunset at The Point, a hidden, waterfront local watering hole within just a few minutes walk of your space.
A lovely snapshot of the boats in Annapolis, at the docks.  Don't miss out on a visit to the awesome state of Maryland's capital!
Sunset at The Point (local watering hole) as watched from their marina, just a few moments stroll from the home.  Did I mention I like The Point...?
The Point Crab House and Grill, at sunset.

hosts.about: I am a proud local who enjoy's working hard, playing hard, and I put my friends and family first.  I tend to make most people I meet my friends, like family!  I enjoy activities and local sports (as most Marylanders do!), and do my best to carve out time for friends and family whenever I can.  I enjoy local restaurants and activities, many of which I am happy to recommend!  I am here to serve you and ensure your stay in my home is just like...well, home!

recent.comments: As descriptors, clean and good communication

items.comments: As descriptors, clean and good communication
Great place to stop after a long day traveling.
Extremely clean and comfortable.  Nice added treat having the piano available to use.  We also enjoyed the chickens and the beautiful garden.

We wanted to get out of the city after a business trip to a quiet haven near the local rivers, and their cozy but spacious apartment was  the perfect place for us.  Easy private access and parking in front with good clear instructions. The bed was comfortable. The drinks and snacks in the kitchen were much appreciated.   Lannie and Tom are great hosts. 
Also, we really enjoyed seeing their cool little backyard farm.
Lovely place! Very clean and Lannie is a great host by providing coffee and snacks in the kitchen area 😋

The place was very clean and welcoming. We felt right at home. We followed the listed recommendations and had dinner at The Point and loved it! We really enjoyed our stay and wouldn’t hesitate to book again.

Nice Place Ever.
Far from 50mins from D.C.
Everything is perfect for 3days trip.

description.summary: This in-law apartment located in the lower level of my occupied home is just moments outside of Annapolis, mere blocks from the Magothy River.  I enjoy inviting guests into the space, and take pride in treating new friends like family.  Come rest your weary bones in your private retreat with its own separate entrance, relaxing sunporch, and stocked kitchenette.  Reach into the fridge and enjoy cold soda or a local beer on me! Sit around our fireplace and relax. Settle into the Old Bay Bungalow!
description.space: This charming space is located in the lower level of my home.  The Old Bay Bungalow is perfect for a couple spending time in the Annapolis area or for a family or friends who wish to visit together.  This beautiful space is both useful and efficient as it comfortably accommodates up to 4 people!  You'll find an opportunity to appreciate the best of the Annapolis area and still be catered to with creature comforts here...without breaking your budget.  Enjoy a peaceful stay in this fully appointed in-law apartment.  The space is separate from the upper level of the home, where I live with my spouse Tom, our children, and a couple of spoiled critters. You'll have easy access to your space via a separate, private entrance located around the rear side of the home off of the back patio, all on one level.  Enjoy your own private bedroom;  you'll find the queen bed is warm and comfortable.  If you choose to invite friends or family members along, the living room's Ikea sleeper sofa quickly converts to a comfortable queen bed complete with fresh, crisp linens for all. Please let me know upon booking if the sofa bed is needed in addition to the private bedroom, and linens will be made available upon said request.  Any additional guests after 2 guests will be an additional $10 per person per night due to the additional bedding needed and subsequent laundry.    Babies, of course, get to slide under the radar and get a free ride!  You will have access to your own full, newly renovated bathroom which is gorgeous.  A flat-screened TV with access to Netflix and Amazon Prime is all yours after a long day exploring the Annapolis area. Through the Fall and Wintertime, the fireplace is stacked with wood and kindling, ready to light.  Your fridge is stocked with complimentary local microbrews, soda, water, plus yogurts for breakfast time.  Your Keurig provides as much hot coffee and tea as you can drink during your stay, and a bowl full of snacks is sure to satisfy any cravings.  If you get hungry for something more, I highly recommend hoofing it down to The Point where fresh seafood and delicious burgers and salads are served.  This local, waterfront gem is less than a 10 minutes walk from this home, and I think it's the perfect place to top off any day. Their happy hour prices are on point! If you have any leftovers, no problem...just stash them in your fridge and heat them up in the space's microwave later.  Curl up at the end of the night with one of the books located in my personal library. If you know how to play the piano, please feel free to tickle the ivory.  Most importantly, make yourself comfortable!
description.access: Please make yourself comfortable within your private suite and anywhere within the yard. Please feel free to wander about my garden, and pick anything you’d like when it’s in season!
description.notes:
1. We live upstairs with both our little human critters as well as our pets.  Your space is separate and our pets will not enter your space. Your space is a dedicated animal-free zone in order to serve those who may have allergies to animals. This is an active family home.  We look forward to meeting you, but we respect your privacy!

2.  There is a pack-and-play located in the closet of the bedroom.  Please feel free to utilize as needed.  Babies and kiddos are welcomed here, and if you need anything to accommodate yours, please let me know.  There is also an iron/ironing board located inside the door of the closet in your living area, along with cleaning supplies. Please feel free to use as needed. 

3. I love and support our Military, LEO's, Teachers, and First Responders.  Thank you for all that you do.  Please let me know so I can give you a  discount.  It's the least I can do for those that lay it all down on the line for the rest of us!
description.neighborhood:
This neighborhood is a laid-back, family-oriented neighborhood located just moments outside of Annapolis. It's quiet (ok, there may be some fireworks on the 4th of July...), and it's a close knit community.  

Enjoy taking a walk around the area and don't miss out on strolling down to the waterfront just blocks from the home.  Locate the key for the private community beach on the mantle above the fireplace.  The private beach provides a gorgeous view.  If you are hungry for a delicious meal or want to make it to Happy Hour, I recommend The Point.  You can choose to walk from our house or make the 1 minute drive!  They have incredible crab cakes, great happy hour eats and treats, and a vast array of beers on tap.  Enjoy!
description.transit:
Please feel free to park on the street in front of the home.
Your space is conveniently located approximately 10 minutes outside of Annapolis.  In little more than a few moments drive, you can access everything Annapolis has to offer.  This location allows easy, quick access to all major routes including Route 50 and I-97, for those in need of commuting to Washington DC, Baltimore, and surrounding areas.
description.interaction: I have a strong belief that a nice fire pairs well with a hot mug of coffee, steaming tea, or a good brew (generally one at a time...but heck, knock yourself out)!  I am always available via text, message, or phone call.   If you need anything, I am happy to assist you with whatever you may need.  Please never hesitate to contact me.  I can't count how many guests have become truly great friends, and my aim is to make you feel at home during your stay.  Whatever you need, I am happy to accommodate.
description.house_rules:
1.  This is a smoke-free home.  If you must smoke, please do so outside and dispose of properly in the trash cans outside.  Thanks!
2.  Be excellent to each other.
3.  Relax.
4.  Enjoy yourself!

hosts.about: Welcome to Bojano Hospitality, where guests can expect top-notch service and a seamless stay. As experienced hosts, we pride ourselves on providing comfortable and inviting homes, and ensuring that our guests have everything they need to feel at home during their travels. With attention to detail and a commitment to hospitality, Bojano Hospitality is the perfect choice for anyone looking for a trusted and enjoyable stay. Book with confidence, and let us take care of the rest.

I was born and raised in Brooklyn, New York but was attracted by the sun-soaked ambiance of Tampa, FL, where I currently live.

Here I am pursuing a career in real estate, and I am licensed Realtor in the state of Florida.
I recently decided to rent my lovely properties, to visitors coming to the area. I am looking to provide the best possible experience for guests visiting the city. There is nothing more reassuring and calming than finding a place that feels like a second home on your travels. 

To escape everyday life's tempo, I love E skateboarding, fishing, and rollerblading.
Feel free to contact me with any questions you might have, or even if you want to say hi.

I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Discover the comfort of home, no matter where your travels take you. At Bojano Homes, we believe in creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere that our guests can enjoy during their stay. From fully-equipped kitchens to comfortable bedrooms, our homes are designed to make your stay as enjoyable and stress-free as possible. Trust us to be your hosts and experience the best in short-term rental living. Book your next stay with Bojano Homes today!

Growing up in a vintage house built in the 1700s, I have a passion for restoring historic homes with functionality and finesse.  

In my professional life I'm a sociologist and human behavior expert, and I like to have few great books for guests to peruse at all of my locations. 

I also very much believe in feng shui, so you'll find that all of my homes just feel exceptionally comfortable as careful consideration and study has gone into every detail of the properties. 

Keep in mind that these are older homes and have nuances and charm unlike cookie-cutter modern townhomes.  

Having traveled the world, I can absolutely say there is no place like this home.  It is truly a timeless, tasteful treasure.  

I hope you enjoy this home as much as I do. It is an honor to host you as my guests.

recent.comments: Beautiful property perfect for our large family get together! The multitude of bedrooms and living areas / tv rooms gave everyone enough space and the property was well kept and wonderful. They provided everything you could need and were very proactive with help and recommendations! Would definitely stay here again!

items.comments: Beautiful property perfect for our large family get together! We had a group of 14, and everyone was comfortable and so happy with this home. Louisa’s home was just a walking distance away from so many things and nothing was more than 15min away. Louisa was such a blessing! You should definitely book this home!
Thank you for everything.

Our family thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Louisa and her team are easy to communicate with and always made sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed. They were always willing to help. Great location, and home is spacious and comfortable! I would highly recommend staying here.
What a unique and gorgeous house - well maintained and appointed. So close to waterfront and capitol.

The townhouse was lovely and peaceful--a real delight.  Comfortable beds. Perfect for our large group to have privacy within the home.  Loved the decor--looks just like the pictures.  Parking was easy for the three cars we came in and fortunately we were either away at Hershey Park during meter enforcement or eligible for free parking.  

Louisa was a very responsive host.  This was worth the price!

description.summary: Stunning Downtown N 2nd Street Mansion sleeps 20+ just one block to Capitol Building, Riverfront Park, St. Patrick's Cathedral, Little Amps, Cork & Fork and Sammy's Italian Restaurant. Walk to Broad Street Market, City Island Beach Club-FNB Field, Susquehanna Art Museum & UPMC Hospital. 5 min drive to Farm Show & National Civil War Museum. 25 min to Hershey Park, 45 min to Gettysburg, less than 1 mile to Amtrak, 11 miles from Harrisburg Aiport, 90 miles from BWI & PHL, 110 miles from DCA & IAD.
description.space:
@harrisburgmansion on IG
(Link to 3D tour in bio)

Experience the charm of this historic home nestled in the vibrant Capitol District, putting you within walking distance from all Harrisburg attractions. The remodeled, spacious house offers a memorable retreat for families, businesses, and leisure travelers.

Explore all three and half levels of this home to discover numerous relaxing and entertaining areas.

✔ 6 Bedrooms (4 private/2 pass-through suites)
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Grand Room (Piano, Guitar)
✔ TV/Game Room (Fooseball, Pool Table, Darts)
✔ Office Area for Remote Work
✔ Courtyard
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi 

Learn more below!

This stunning three and a half level historic townhouse is an ideal base from which you can visit everything Harrisburg has to offer. The property was built in 1832, predating the state capitol and offers you a chance to experience a fortress of a home that is part of the rich history of the city.

As soon as you step inside, you will find yourself in the charming foyer with marble tiles and ornate hand-plastered detail on the entry walls leading to the luxurious grand room which is perfect for entertaining. The fully equipped kitchen with an inviting dining area makes it easy to relax on the first floor. All sleeping and bathroom arrangements are located on the second and third floor of the home. 

Ascend the stairs to the second level and discover additional tastefully furnished, comfortable, and entertaining rooms.  Play a friendly game of fooseball and watch your favorite show on the second floor, or catch some fresh air by stepping out on the balcony. There is so much to do wherever you go in the many areas of this home.

The third level includes a cozy remote office area with portable workstation as well as a Kurig coffee maker to energize your remote work meetings. Take a break from work and step onto the balcony with majestic view of St. Patricks Cathedral Dome.

Elegant wooden floors and touches are enriched by rays of natural light coming through large windows to provide a stunning and homey setting on all three levels. 

Once you are ready to rest and relax, make your way to six comfortable bedrooms designed to offer all the rest needed after an unforgettable day of Harrisburg sightseeing.

★ LIVING ROOMS ★
There are living/sitting room areas on each level of the home. Whether you are looking to play a recital for your friends and family, have a movie night, or do some work, this oasis has a room for everyone.

♛ Grand Room (First Floor)
Don't miss the opportunity of gathering next to the intimate fireplace and enjoying the company of your loved ones. It comes with musical instruments and ample seating space to host an unforgettable concert for a private audience or practice your ballroom dancing on the hardword floors.

✔ Comfortable Sofas
✔ Decorative Indoor Fireplace
✔ Yamaha GH1 Baby Grand Piano
✔ Acoustic Guitar
✔ Stylish Lamps and Lights

♛ TV/Family Room (First Floor)
While you are preparing a gormet feast in the chef’s kitchen there is a cozy sectional sofa TV family area nestled at the back of the home which offers a quiet area to unwind. 

♛ TV/Game Room (Second Floor)
The second floor offers an oversized entertainment space for fun movie marathons and a game area for a more active form of entertainment.

✔ Comfy U-Shaped Sofa with Pillows & Blankets
✔ Smart TV
✔ Full Size Pool Table
✔ Ms. Pac-Man Arcade Game
✔ Karaoke Machine with Microphone
✔ Mini-Fridge
✔ Full Size Foosball Table
✔ Dart Board
✔ Wireless Laser Printer

♛ Workstation | Remote Office (Third Floor)
The third-floor built in desk and reading area poses as an ideal space for those who need to attend to work during their visit or need to partake in a virtual learning session.

✔ 5 ft built in desk
✔ Laptop Station with Comfy Seating
✔ Smart TV
✔ Keurig Coffee Maker


★ KITCHEN & DINING ★
A beautiful kitchen with wooden cabinetry, state-of-the-art appliances, and spacious countertops will satisfy all your needs if you decide to prepare any homemade delicacies. In addition, the central kitchen bar allows for extra workspace during preparations of gourmet feasts.

✔ Microwave
✔ GE Profile 6-Burner Stove
✔ Double Oven
✔ Viking Refrigerator/Freezer
✔ New Dishwasher
✔ Keurig Coffee Maker
✔ Drip Coffee Maker
✔ French Press
✔ Coffee Mugs and Cups
✔ Tea Kettle and Tea Pots
✔ Assorted Teas and Hot Chocolate
✔ Basic Cooking Essentials & Spicers
✔ VitaMix Blender
✔ Toaster
✔ Cuisinart Airfryer Countertop Convection Oven
✔ Trays
✔ Wine Glasses & Champagne Flutes
✔ Silverware
✔ Pots & Pans

The dining room is conveniently nestled next to the kitchen, allowing you to serve your tasty delicacies easily. Have a couple of drinks at the kitchen bar while the food is getting ready or even watch the big game on the in-kitchen TV.

✔ Dining Table with Seating for 12
✔ Kitchen Bar with Seating for 3
✔ Additional Chairs
✔ Kitchen TV Area (Sofa, Smart TV, Cable, Board Games)

★ SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS – 6 BEDROOMS★
The second and third levels are where you will find these well designed rooms with comfy mattresses and soft linens. Each bedroom is tastefully decorated with exquisite details and amenities, touched by an abundance of sunlight bursting through large windows.

♛ Bedroom 1 (Second Floor) - Queen over Full Bunk Bed + 2 Twin Beds + Smart TV + Balcony
♛ Bedroom 2 (Second Floor) *PASS-THROUGH Suite  - 2 Full Beds
♛ Bedroom 3 (Third Floor) - King Bed + SmartTV
♛ Bedroom 4 (Third Floor) *PASS-THROUGH Suite – 2 Queen Beds + Twin Sleeper Sofa + Office Work Station + Library SmartTV + Balcony
♛ Bedroom 5 (Third Floor) – Master Bedroom – King Bed + Crib + 2 Queen Air Mattresses + SmartTV
♛ Bedroom 6 (Third Floor) – Compact Twin Bed

All bedrooms offer a similar set of amenities:

✔ Premium Pillows, Linens, and Sheets
✔ Smart TVs
✔ Closest with Hangers and Shelves
✔ Cabinets with Spacious Drawers
✔ Night Stands with Reading Lamps

★ BATHROOMS ★
Spectacular spa quality top floor bathroom with oversized walk in shower, spa tub, double vanity, and bidet. Additional full bath (tub and shower) on the second floor and another full bath on the third floor (shower) with laundry for your maximum comfort and convenience. All are stocked with fresh towels and essential toiletries.

✔ Jetted Bathtub (Master Bath)
✔ Shower Cabin
✔ Vanity
✔ Mirror
✔ Toilet
✔ Towels
✔ Hair Dryer
✔ Essential Toiletries

★ COURTYARD + BALCONY ★
Even though the interior offers numerous entertaining and relaxing areas for the whole group to enjoy, you will want to spend some time outside. Start with the cozy balcony on the second floor and make your way down to the courtyard with an additional seating area and views of the adjacent cathedral.

✔ Courtyard with Seating Areas	 
✔ 2nd & 3rd Floor Balconies with Table and Chairs

Let this charming, fully renovated 1832 home be a base for a perfect stay in Harrisburg.

Guest access 

The house is exclusively yours, without interruption for the duration of your stay, so relax, unwind, and make yourself at home. 

Other than the already mentioned amenities, our home also comes with:

✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Air Conditioning
✔ Heating
✔ Laundry Room (Third Floor) w/ Washer/Dryer

Other things to note

★ COVID-19 SANITIZATION ★
Heath, safety, and wellbeing of our guests are of utmost importance. For this reason, we use a thorough cleaning process after each check-out.

Interaction with guests 

We will be accessible 24/7 for our guests via phone, text, or the Airbnb app. 
Expect a quick and prompt response. We give our guests space but are available for every inquiry.

Contact us now so we can begin arranging your perfect vacation!

The neighborhood

Overview

The gorgeous historic home is nestled in the very heart of the bustling Capitol District, allowing walking access to museums, markets, restaurant row, riverfront park, city island, and excellent nightlife. 

Those traveling for a wedding party, house of representative gathering, or a family reunion will love that the vibrant State Street is just a minute away from home. 

Here are some places of interest you'll be looking to visit during your stay.

✔ Little Amps Coffee Roasters (1 min away)
✔ Cork & Fork (1 min away)
✔ Pennsylvania State Capitol Complex (2 mins away)	
✔ The State Museum of Pennsylvania (2 mins away)
✔ Susquehanna Art Museum (3 mins away)
✔ Broad Street Market (3 mins away)
✔ City Island (5 mins away)
✔ The Harrisburg YMCA (6 mins away)
✔ The National Civil War Museum (8 mins away)
description.access:
PARKING!!!

This is a downtown location. Parking is metered. Easiest to download the parkmobile app. Zone for Harrisburg is 9122. 

There are usually plenty of spaces right outside the front door. Parking on N 2nd Street directly in front of the home is metered Monday thru Saturday from 8 am until 7 pm. 

Parking on State Street (1/2 block from home) is metered 8am-5pm. 

It is okay to park on the Street overnight (no charge from 7pm til 8 am). 

Parking is Free on Sundays and holiday.  Check the ParkHarrisburg website for more information. 

The South Street Garage is less than 1 block from the home. 

NOTE: There are Street Cleaning Days (check signs in front of home.)

Getting around

If you arrive by car, you will be happy to know that there is plenty of street parking right outside the front door. However, if driving is something you would like to avoid during your stay, there are many convenient, easily accessible transportation options close to our home.

✔ Buses
✔ Taxis
✔ Both Lyft & UBER operate in the area
description.notes:
This is a fantastic historical home with lots of charm and it is built like a fortress. Even though it is located in the heart of the city it is quite quiet. 

The hosts have carefully selected many essentials that even the most seasoned world traveler can appreciate from the glassware to the down comforters with duvet covers to the bamboo pillows. 

We hope you enjoy your stay. Any questions related to comfort (heating/cooling/fans/etc) just ask. 

Thank you so much for being our guest(s).
description.neighborhood: Historic downtown location on restaurant row. 1/2 block from Capitol Building.
description.transit:
This is a city residence and there is metered parking available directly in front of the home. 

Parking is enforced from 8 am - 7 pm Monday thru Saturday. 

Parking is metered  on State Street from 8am-5pm on Monday-Saturday.  (This is located 1/2 block from home.)

Parking is Free on Sundays.

Free parking is also available for four hours on Saturday by downloading the Parkmobile app and using the code LUVHBG at checkout. Parking is free on Sundays. 

There is parking available at the South Street Garage which is just 1 block from the home. 

Hope this information helps. 

Please let us know any additional questions you may have.

description.summary:
*No cleaning or pet fees!*

Experience the allure of a fully remodeled 100-year-old home in Hagerstown, Maryland. Nestled on a half-acre, this convenient pet-friendly gem is just 5 minutes from Interstates 70 and 81. With ample parking, this 2600+ sq ft abode exudes cozy charm infused with an industrial-chic vibe. Indulge in a gourmet kitchen, spa-like bathrooms, and comfortable bedrooms. The icing on the cake? A fantastic deck for unforgettable entertaining complete with a tranquil Koi pond.
description.space:
Prepare to be greeted with warmth and an unmistakable touch of luxury upon your arrival. Quickly you will discover this is no ordinary Airbnb; it is our personal home where we invite you to feel truly at home too, during your stay (without us of course!) Every single furnishing has been carefully selected, sourced from renowned designer labels or as unique antiques. Nothing here is generic or stock.

Discover an abundance of space, offering ample room to unwind and relax. The living room boasts a beautiful Arhaus tufted sectional, complemented by a cozy gas fireplace and a 70-year-old grand piano. Fresh flowers add a touch of elegance, while the large dining table invites shared meals and memorable conversations. The comfortable beds, along with an available air mattress, ensure a restful night's sleep. Indulge in relaxation with a slipper tub and a rejuvenating spa shower, conveniently accompanied by a washer and dryer located upstairs.

Luxuriate in plush linens that envelop you in comfort, enhanced further by memory foam mattress toppers. High-end toiletries are thoughtfully provided for your convenience. Throughout the space, tasteful art adds a touch of aesthetic appeal, and an abundance of books and games await your perusement and play in the attic lounge.

To enhance your experience, we have the fastest Wi-Fi available for this area, and a Bluetooth sound system allows you to link your phone and enjoy your favorite music. Immerse yourself in the world of vinyl with a modern turntable. The convenience of four Amazon "Alexas" placed strategically throughout the home ensures effortless assistance (easy to turn off if desired). Each of the four flat-screen TVs are equipped with popular streaming apps, allowing you to sign in and enjoy your preferred entertainment.

For coffee and tea lovers, a selection of beverages awaits your indulgence. Instant hot water and Reverse Osmosis water from the sink provide added convenience. The kitchen is equipped with top-of-the-line All-Clad and Le Creuset cookware, alongside a Vitamix blender, air fryer, and Cuisinart food processor, amongst many other gourmet kitchen tools.

Step outside onto the deck, where outdoor dining and relaxing evenings beckon, including an invitation to relax next to our Koi pond. An umbrella provides dining shade, and the sectional gives ample seating. For those who enjoy grilling, an outside gas grill and dining area are at your disposal. 
Inside, a revolving pantry and a stocked fridge with popular condiments ensure you lack for nothing during your stay.

Rest assured, every detail has been considered to ensure your comfort and satisfaction. Stay with us and experience a warm welcome that will exceed your expectations.
description.access: You have access to entire house, minus the basement which is where I store my personal belongings, and the detached garage which will be locked. There might be a small locked hauling trailer on property behind garage, out of your way.
description.notes:
This is my personal home. Respect is expected. I am a seasoned Airbnb host that has seen it all. I maintain the right to deny any booking request I don’t believe fits this listing, and if negligence or unreasonable damage is present after your departure, I will proceed with a financial claim. I have rarely had to do this, thankfully.

With that being said, I do NOT charge a cleaning fee, pet fee, and do not ask you to do any “chores” at checkout outside of common sense. When I travel, I want to relax, so I want that for you too.

Early check-in and/or late check-out can be prearranged at $25 per hour, for up to 5 hours in either direction. Please be courteous and prompt with designated check out times, as my cleaning crew will be waiting to start.

Due to experience, there will be a $50 extra fee if confetti is NOT cleaned up upon departure. It’s extremely difficult to clean (it sticks to everything) and my cleaning crew is delayed when turning over the property. Please just stick with balloons and streamers like the good ‘ol days. :)

I host a revolving pantry with my guests. This means there might be condiments and unused food (not expired) in the refrigerator, freezer, or pantry. Feel free to use what you wish, and leave what you can’t take.

Use caution in attic. Not recommended for small children unattended. No railings installed.

No open fire/flames allowed outside (fire pit, etc) No parties or events allowed.

Lawn is mowed by a landscaping company every Friday from April to November.

Contact me for special event rates. This house is the perfect size for a baby or bridal shower, or other intimate gatherings.

1.3 miles away from Hagerstown Premium Outlets. Minutes away from interstate 70 and 81. Minutes from downtown Hagerstown. Minutes from West Virginia and Pennsylvania. 
Ideal and centrally located.
Approximately 75 minutes from DC.

hosts.about: Hi! We love to travel, eating at new restaurants, relaxing, and lots of coffee;) We hostedAirbnb for over year at our previous house, but now have moved to Reading Pennsylvania where we are in the process of fixing up a 20,000 square-foot factory into our home and a few Airbnb spaces! (And yes it is as awesome as it sounds) We are Christ followers and would gladly discuss our relationship with Him with you!

recent.comments: This place was extremely nice to stay in. The kitchen was well set up has every cooking tool you need and we used it a lot it was great. The beds were so comfortable and the whole place was very fresh and clean, the bathroom even had those hotel travel soaps.

items.comments: This place was extremely nice to stay in. The kitchen was well set up has every cooking tool you need and we used it a lot it was great. The beds were so comfortable and the whole place was very fresh and clean, the bathroom even had those hotel travel soaps.

Talk about the BEST air Bnb you will ever stay in. First, Charles and Abigail are ready to go above and beyond to make sure you are happy, I have never had hosts like them. Their place is beautiful, everything is so well thought out. CLEANEST air Bnb, with everything included (phone chargers, advil, razors, any cooking supply you think of, even eggs and sausages for breakfast, and welcome gifts of course).

Thank you for the best stay, we can’t wait to be repeat stayers!!

The most beautiful Airbnb we have ever stayed in! We actually gasped when we walked in. The way the light from the windows enters the space is magical- the entire home is more beautiful in reality than even the photos. Charles and Abigail are wonderful hosts- very responsive and easy to communicate with and so friendly!! We felt so welcome. We loved the thoughtful touches- the coffee, the well stocked fridge, the toiletries in the bathroom, and toys in the piano room! Our toddler had an absolute blast and didn’t want to leave. This space is very comfortable for travel with a child- the layout is perfect, our toddler wandered all over without an issue. He loved the yogurt in the fridge! And was able to start his day with an egg too :) the beds and linens are crisp and clean, and the whole home smells amazing! If we ever come back to Reading, this is where we will always stay hands down. A perfect home away from home. Thank you again!

***MUST STAY****
Where do I even begin.  My husband special requested that we rent a Tesla during our stay in Reading. When we discovered this listing that also had the opportunity to rent their car, I knew it was perfect.  We stayed for the car but loved it for all the details and wonderful hosts.  Charles and Abigail thought of everything.  I enjoyed the electric shades, Alexa integrated lights, smart tv, wonderful hot shower with great pressure and very comfortable beds. After visiting New York for a few days we felt like we had made it to a home away from home.  Not only was everything perfect, the hosts were proactive in making sure our stay was the best possible. They communicated quickly and were some of the best hosts we’ve had. You won’t regret your stay.
Excelentes anfitriones, siempre pendientes y siempre dispuestos a ayudar y a resolver cualquier cosa adicional que fuese requerida, volvería con gusto
We truly enjoyed our stay here! Will be back! This place was a gem!

Excelente customer service. I needed a place to stay at the last minute. They cleaned the place within 2 hours of my last minute reservation.They answered all of my messages right away. Very nice host. Thank you Charles and Abigail for literally saving my trip by letting me stay at your place with a short notice.

description.summary: This is the place for a one of a kind stay! Our apartment is a newly remodeled apartment in an original factory building. We offer modern Scandinavian decor, the convenience of smart locks, window blinds, robot vacuum, lighting, and High speed WIFi up to 1  GBPS! Also a 4k UHD 50 inch TV with Netflix, HBO Max, Prime Video, Hulu, and Disney Plus. 2 King  Gel Memory Foam 14-Inch hypoallergenic Mattresses. And a Keurig Special Edition coffee maker for expressos, americanos, or other milk creations!
description.space:
Although this is an apartment in a larger building, the rest of the building is still being remodeled and you will not be interacting with other guests. We designed this apartment to be open, welcoming, and trendy! Light streams in the huge windows during the day, and custom touches like the exposed brick and original flooring remind you of the factory that this building was.  There is not off street parking, but our street often has parking, and there is a school across the street who’s parking lot can be used during the off hours. You will not have access to the rest of the building.

We are very pleased to now offer a 2021 Tesla model Y rental in conjuncture with your stay! If you book this vehicle it comes with free indoor parking and 100% free supercharging at public chargers and free high speed overnight charging. So you will not have any fuel expenses at all! Please message me prior to your stay to check availability and then after you book I will coordinate with you for your discount to rent it on Turo. 

If you are flying into Philadelphia airport we may be able to either pick you up at the airport or arrange delivery of the car at the terminal, depending on our schedule $125 each way. 

We offer discounts for combined stay and car rent.  And discounts for longer stays.

Car rental prices:
2 days minimum $99 per day
7 days or more $75 per day
30 days or more $50 per day

https://turo.com/us/en/suv-rental/united-states/reading-pa/tesla/model-y/906900
description.access: You will have access to the entire apartment, but not to any areas of the rest of the building.
description.notes: We do live in the city so there could be some related noises, to assist you we offer complimentary earplugs and a sound machine. But overall it is fairly quiet. Also we have a zero tolerance policy on parties. Only the people mentioned on the reservation may enter.
description.neighborhood: We live in the city, so there is the normal amount of city noise, although our apartment is away from the street and pretty quiet! We are surrounded by a church and a school, which really helps it feel like a nice atmosphere. As in any city, we don’t recommend anything unsafe such as traipsing around the streets alone in the middle of the night.   We are near the Santander arena, and several lovely restaurants we would love to recommend to you!
description.interaction: We live in a different apartment in the Factory and should be available to greet you and answer any questions. We will also be available through messaging!
description.house_rules:
No parties please. Only the people on your reservation are allowed inside. Please message me if you would like an exception. 
Also absolutely no drugs are allowed on the property, please respect this. Thanks:)
